name: Dream Tear - Elementar Rising 3 - Rise of Disorder
name_original: Dream Tear - Elementar Rising 3 - Rise of Disorder
description:
A year following the events of Dream Tear - Atom Maker a new strange force of elementally suited, freedom fighters have begun to take action against rising K.A.O.S forces. Gabe Kuo, Chris Kumono and Imogen Geist while on a mission in New Tech City, are told to check in on the current happenings. They have no idea that things are about to become far more complicated than they have imagined.

Dream Tear - Goes freestyle with it's game style now. As it dev'd up as an rpg it is now breaking out into full blown shoot'em up fighter.

  • Platform Gameplay -
    A shooter/plat-former/with sharp mouse aiming.
  • 4 Playable characters, each with their own unique abilities. Electricity,Fire
    Wind and Ice. Shooter,Swordsman,Archer and Fighter.
  • Swap between characters to create explosive combos, and advance different locations based on character only 'charged' skills.
  • Gain new abilities as you level your characters up, and even get temp skills from foes you encounter on stage.
  • Puzzle platforming and action gameplay help move things forward, which flows with a deep story as well.
  • Stories help to bring characters to life as well as flesh out more of the world of dream tear ER.
